title: Demonstration on how to recite loudly in loud prayers - Assim al hakeem
transcript: can you demonstrate how to recite in loud prayers well i'm praying at night prayer and i'm praying alone and i say like this so i hear myself those in the room hear me outside of the room they don't what is not permissible is to say alhamdulillah you'll wake the whole neighborhood no this is not recommended and it's also not recommended to just go like because you have to raise it and make it in between so alhamdulillah this is perfect you
